job_tasks.phrase: De komende tijd zal jij werken aan het mogelijk maken om interne documenten van onze klanten te gebruiken, een case-builder helpen op te zetten en continue verbeteringen aan onze codebase door te voeren.

soft_skills.phrase: De komende tijd zal jij werken aan het mogelijk maken om interne documenten van onze klanten te gebruiken, een case-builder helpen op te zetten en continue verbeteringen aan onze codebase door te voeren. Daarnaast krijg je de mogelijkheid om je AI kennis te vergroten.

soft_skills.phrase: Generative AI is de juridische sector snel aan het veranderen. Deze technologie biedt veel mogelijkheden om het werk van juristen en fiscalisten efficiÃ«nter en leuker te maken.
soft_skills.justification: This demonstrates an understanding of how Generative AI impacts the legal sector and aims to make the work of legal professionals more efficient, showing business context awareness.

profile.rationale: The job ad describes a back-end developer role with a significant focus on integrating and improving an AI product (GenIA-L) that uses Generative AI (GPT). While core software development tasks (1.A.1) are present, there is also explicit mention of working with machine learning models (1.B.1) and increasing AI knowledge, specifically mentioning GPT. The role aims to integrate AI into user workflows and improve the AI system itself. This balance of software engineering with specific Generative AI tasks, including experimentation with models, aligns best with the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly indicates a back-end development role with a strong interest and involvement in AI, specifically Generative AI. The mention of integrating AI into workflows and experimenting with models (including GPT) provides good evidence for the profile. However, the depth of AI-specific tasks beyond 'experimentation' and 'integration' could be more detailed to reach a score of 5. The primary focus remains on back-end development with an AI component.
